page.title: 11BRISTOL A CHILD'S VIEW
page.content: {WESTBURY PARK { I like Westbury Park,our old house was much smaller but the one here is enormous! Now we can go to clubs eg ice skating ,art club ,country dancing. I live much nearer the school my friends and the shops.We can walk to all of them we live near our relations eg.Our grannies,our great uncle and our aunts and uncles.I also like Westbury Park because it doesn't have smoky factories.It is not all dirty but it is a pretty place to live in.I also like it because the edge of the Downs is in Westbury Park.You can go bike riding on the paths.I'm glad I live in Westbury Park.
